languages.text: {n}Во время {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}службы на флоте{/d} вы повидали немало масштабных аварий и четко знаете, как перераспределить питание систем, чтобы выиграть время и ресурсы для приоритетных задач. Ваш план работает — теперь у корабля больше шансов не стать грудой металлолома в ближайшие часы. Судя по голосам офицеров, они искренне рады, что ими командует человек, понимающий, что делать.{/n}

{n}During your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}time in the Navy{/d}, you have encountered more than a few critical failures. As a result, you know exactly how to redistribute the system power to help you buy whatever time and resources might be needed to address priority issues. Your plan succeeds, and the ship now stands a better chance of not collapsing into a pile of scrap within the next few hours. You can tell from the officers' voices that they are very glad to be under the command of someone who knows what they are doing.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Во время {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}службы на флоте{/d} вы повидали немало масштабных аварий и четко знаете, как перераспределить питание систем, чтобы выиграть время и ресурсы для приоритетных задач. Ваш план работает — теперь у корабля больше шансов не стать грудой металлолома в ближайшие часы. Судя по голосам офицеров, они искренне рады, что ими командует человек, понимающий, что делать.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}During your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}time in the Navy{/d}, you have encountered more than a few critical failures, and therefore you know exactly how to redistribute the system power to buy enough time and resources in order to address priority issues. Your plan succeeds, and the ship now stands a better chance of not turning into a pile of scrap in the next few hours. You can tell from the officers' voices that they are very glad to be following the commands of someone who knows what they are doing.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Während deiner {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}Zeit bei der Flotte{/d} hattest du nicht nur einmal mit kritischen Fehlern zu tun. Deshalb weißt du genau, wie du die Systemenergie umleiten musst, um dir genug Zeit und Ressourcen für die Lösung vorrangiger Probleme zu verschaffen. Dein Plan geht auf und das Schiff hat nun eine bessere Chance, in den nächsten Stunden nicht zu implodieren. Du erkennst an den Stimmen der Offiziere, dass sie ausgesprochen froh sind, jemandem zu dienen, der weiß, was er tut.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}During your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}time in the Navy{/d}, you have encountered more than a few critical failures. languages.text: {n}Au cours de vos années de {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}service au sein de la Marine{/d}, vous avez plus d'une fois été {mf|confronté|confrontée} à des défaillances critiques. Résultat, vous savez exactement comment redistribuer l'énergie qui alimente le système pour gagner le temps et les ressources nécessaires à la résolution des problèmes prioritaires. Votre plan porte ses fruits, et le vaisseau ne risque plus d'être réduit à l'état d'épave dans les prochaines heures. Vous sentez à la voix des officiers qu'ils se réjouissent d'être sous le commandement {mf|d'un chef qui sait ce qu'il fait||d'une cheffe qui sait ce qu'elle fait}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}During your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}time in the Navy{/d}, you have encountered more than a few critical failures. As a result, you know exactly how to redistribute the system power to help you buy whatever time and resources might be needed to address priority issues. Your plan succeeds, and the ship now stands a better chance of not collapsing into a pile of scrap within the next few hours. You can tell from the officers' voices that they are very glad to be under the command of someone who knows what they are doing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Au cours de vos années de {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}service au sein de la Marine{/d}, vous avez plus d'une fois été {mf|confronté|confrontée} à des défaillances critiques. Résultat, vous savez exactement comment redistribuer l'énergie qui alimente le système pour gagner le temps et les ressources nécessaires à la résolution des problèmes prioritaires. Votre plan porte ses fruits, et le vaisseau ne risque plus d'être réduit à l'état d'épave dans les prochaines heures. Vous sentez à la voix des officiers qu'ils se réjouissent d'être sous le commandement {mf|d'un chef qui sait ce qu'il fait||d'une cheffe qui sait ce qu'elle fait}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Durante tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}paso por la Armada{/d}, experimentaste numerosos fallos críticos de sistemas. Como consecuencia, sabes redistribuir la energía del sistema para ganar tiempo y obtener los recursos necesarios para resolver los problemas prioritarios. Tu plan logra su cometido y ahora hay una probabilidad de que la nave no se convierta en un montón de chatarra a la deriva en las próximas horas. Las voces de tus oficiales reflejan el alivio producido por saber que el mando está en manos de alguien que sabe lo que hace.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}During your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}time in the Navy{/d}, you have encountered more than a few critical failures. As a result, you know exactly how to redistribute the system power to help you buy whatever time and resources might be needed to address priority issues. Your plan succeeds, and the ship now stands a better chance of not collapsing into a pile of scrap within the next few hours. You can tell from the officers' voices that they are very glad to be under the command of someone who knows what they are doing.{/n}

Las voces de tus oficiales reflejan el alivio producido por saber que el mando está en manos de alguien que sabe lo que hace.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}海軍時代{/d}、あなたは何度も深刻な問題に遭遇してきた。結果として、優先度の高い問題に対処するのに必要な時間とリソースを確保するために、システムのパワーを再分配する方法を熟知していた。あなたの作戦は成功し、船は今後数時間、崩れてスクラップの山にならない可能性が高くなった。士官たちの声から、自分が何をしているのかを理解している者の指揮下に入れたことをとても喜んでいるのがわかる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}During your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}time in the Navy{/d}, you have encountered more than a few critical failures. As a result, you know exactly how to redistribute the system power to help you buy whatever time and resources might be needed to address priority issues. Your plan succeeds, and the ship now stands a better chance of not collapsing into a pile of scrap within the next few hours. You can tell from the officers' voices that they are very glad to be under the command of someone who knows what they are doing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}海軍時代{/d}、あなたは何度も深刻な問題に遭遇してきた。結果として、優先度の高い問題に対処するのに必要な時間とリソースを確保するために、システムのパワーを再分配する方法を熟知していた。あなたの作戦は成功し、船は今後数時間、崩れてスクラップの山にならない可能性が高くなった。士官たちの声から、自分が何をしているのかを理解している者の指揮下に入れたことをとても喜んでいるのがわかる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你在{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}帝国海军{/d}服役期间曾遭遇过许多次紧急情况，因此你非常清楚如何重新调度时间与系统资源，解决更为优先、更加急迫的问题。你的计划起了作用，你的飞船多半不会在接下来的几个小时里变成一团废铁。军官们欢呼起来，你意识到，他们很高兴总指挥官知道该如何处理眼下的危机。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}During your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}time in the Navy{/d}, you have encountered more than a few critical failures. As a result, you know exactly how to redistribute the system power to help you buy whatever time and resources might be needed to address priority issues. Your plan succeeds, and the ship now stands a better chance of not collapsing into a pile of scrap within the next few hours. You can tell from the officers' voices that they are very glad to be under the command of someone who knows what they are doing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你在{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}帝国海军{/d}服役期间曾遭遇过许多次紧急情况，因此你非常清楚如何重新调度时间与系统资源，解决更为优先、更加急迫的问题。你的计划起了作用，你的飞船多半不会在接下来的几个小时里变成一团废铁。军官们欢呼起来，你意识到，他们很高兴总指挥官知道该如何处理眼下的危机。{/n}

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}Donanma'da geçirdiğin süreçte{/d} bol miktarda kritik arızayla karşılaşmıştın. Bunun bir sonucu olarak öncelikli meselelerle ilgilenecek zaman ve kaynak kazanmak adına sistemin gücünü tam olarak ne şekilde yeniden dağıtman gerektiğini çok iyi biliyorsun. Planın başarılı oluyor ve geminin gelecek birkaç saat içinde hurda yığınına dönmeme ihtimalini artırıyorsun. Subayların sesinden, ne yaptığını bilen birinin komutası altında olduklarına dair duydukları memnuniyeti hissedebiliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}During your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}time in the Navy{/d}, you have encountered more than a few critical failures. As a result, you know exactly how to redistribute the system power to help you buy whatever time and resources might be needed to address priority issues. Your plan succeeds, and the ship now stands a better chance of not collapsing into a pile of scrap within the next few hours. You can tell from the officers' voices that they are very glad to be under the command of someone who knows what they are doing.{/n}
